title: Reinforced Learning Through Testing
body: Tests are not the end, they are a beginning. Our AI identifies what you haven't mastered yet and guides you until you do.

items.title: Guided Step-by-Step
items.body: If you get it wrong, we don't just show the answer. We explain the 'why' and guide you through a similar problem.

items.title: Homework Mentor
items.body: Guided hints for your homework assignments. Learn the technique, not just the result.

items.title: Recursive Learning
items.body: The AI tracks your mistakes and re-introduces topics in new contexts until mastery is achieved.

items.title: Mastery Tracking
items.body: Visual progress bars showing what % of the curriculum you have truly mastered.

sidebar.title: Smart Drill Engine
sidebar.note: The AI adapts the difficulty and explanation style based on your previous performance to maximize retention.
